        public void addCinemaToCineplex​(int choice,
                                java.lang.String newName,
                                int newType,
                                double basePrice)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        handles adding new cinema to cineplex
        Parameters:
        choice - ID of cineplex to be updated
        newName - name of cinema to be added
        newType - type of cinema to be added
        basePrice - base price of cinema to be added
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if input cinema is invalid in any way

        inserts new movie showing into a cinema

        movie - movie to be inserted into showing list
        date - date of the movie to be inserted
